work_habits.work_environment: hybrid (3 days remote, 2 days in office)
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 2‑3 blocks of 90 minutes daily, protected via calendar

personality.decision_making_approach: data‑driven with rapid iteration; seeks consensus when stakes high
personality.stress_management_approach: structured planning, regular exercise, short mindfulness breaks
personality.conflict_resolution_style: direct but diplomatic, focuses on facts and shared goals

other_commitments: Quarterly board advisory for a fintech startup (5 hrs/month)
availability.travel_flexibility: up to 10% travel (≈5 days per quarter), prefers virtual when possible

personal_factors.caregiving_responsibilities: shared with spouse; occasional school pick‑up duties
personal_factors.health_considerations: runs 3×/week, monitors blood pressure; occasional lower back strain from long sitting
personal_factors.career_motivation: build scalable growth engines, mentor next‑gen leaders, eventually transition to VP of Growth

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: bi‑weekly sprint reviews, weekly 30‑min sync with product, ad‑hoc when data needed
collaboration.feedback_style: direct, data‑backed, balanced with positive reinforcement
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: writes weekly growth postmortems, hosts monthly brown‑bag sessions, maintains shared dashboards

potential_bottlenecks: dependency on data engineering for raw event pipelines
limited bandwidth during major product launches
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Senior Growth Analyst (Emily Rivera) for day‑to‑day experiment execution
burnout_risk_factors: high meeting load during launch weeks
